content: BIW has been downsized for some time now. What with the littoral junk being made elsewhere.

author: Willy
content: Not surprised. There was a ferry of similar design here in Frenchman’s Bay. It tried to operate between Bar Harbor Maine and Nova Scotia. Its biggest problem? The couldnt keep the 4 diesel engines running. According to lacals, they were lucky if Cat Ferry would have two engines that would still be operational after one trip!
